name: EARTHLOCK
description: Earthlock is an indie developed, adventure RPG inspired by the classic 3D RPGs of the late 90's, with a fresh take on turn based combat and character progression.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 GPU with 1GB of memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU with 2GB of memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
